Title: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 10.0.0 before 10.0.17, all versions starting from 11.0.0 before 14.4.7, all versions starting from 15.0.0 before 18.0.6
NotImpacted: All versions before 10.0.0, all versions starting from 10.0.17 before 11.0.0, all versions starting from 14.4.7 before 15.0.0, all versions starting from 18.0.6
